com.umeng.socialize.media

Class UMImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.umeng.socialize.media.BaseMediaObject
      • com.umeng.socialize.media.UMImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable, UMediaObject, Cloneable

    public class UMImage
extends BaseMediaObject

    要分享的图片类型， 只是本地文件，网络文件，资源和Bitmap类型.

    Author:
    Jhen
